entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable using docker build `--platform` switch (easily) #30369
    8.0.1xx
  • `dotnet test` CLI accepts neither SOLUTION nor PROJECT arguments anymore #30368

Closed

  • API Compat implements functionality for checking internal API but does not expose it #28712
    8.0.1xx
  • [dotnet tool] Add ability to check if a tool is installed #23549
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce `exp` prefix in PR to allow better PR review process #30363
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenAPI: synthesize private fields for value types #30362
    Area-GenAPI
  • fixed bug in `CreateTemporaryFolder` counter logic #30359
  • [release/7.0.3xx] fixed bug in `CreateTemporaryFolder` counter logic #30358
  • [release/7.0.2xx][test-only] fixed bug in `CreateTemporaryFolder` counter logic #30357
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.8.0 to 19.9.0 in /eng/dependabot #30355
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30353
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Generate a call of a base class constructor if the default constructor does not exist. #30264
    Area-GenAPI
  • ApiCompat refactoring and small features #30345
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30306
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2105502 #30309
    Area-Infrastructure
